testsuite.name: oradb::installdb CentOS remote oradb utils structure

testcase.name: oradb::installdb CentOS remote oradb utils structure should contain Db_directory_structure[oracle structure 12.1.0.1] with ensure => "present", oracle_base_dir => "/oracle", ora_inventory_dir => "/oracle/oraInventory", os_user => "oracle", os_group => "oinstall" and download_dir => "/install"
